nodes.bodyText:
I have no clue what happened here, I think copy pasting from GH may not have been the best idea
EDIT: It was just my Ctrl+Alt+L settings (I formatted locally by selecting those few lines)
M i s o r g a n i z a t i o n .

How are they misorganized?
You wanted them in alphabetical order, they are.
They aren't together with the other imports from io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.
